name: plaid-connector
description: Full Plaid integration with Link token flow, transactions, identity, auth, balances, investments, liabilities, and webhooks
author: Hermetic Labs

card.title: Plaid Connector
card.description: Banking integration with transactions, identity, and investments

summary.overview: Full Plaid integration with Link token flow, transaction sync, identity verification, ACH authentication, investment holdings, liabilities tracking, and webhook handling.
summary.exampleUseCase: Connect bank accounts via Plaid Link, sync transactions for expense tracking, verify identity for KYC, and monitor investment holdings across institutions.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Direct Plaid API access with your credentials. Webhook handling built-in for real-time updates. Pairs with PCI compliance for secure payment workflows.
